1: <pb/><t>A on̈ anima on̈ tic tzon̈ alji d'a co nun, jab'n̈ej tiempo squila', scaln̈ej yaelal tzon̈ eq'ui.</t>
2: <t>Lajan co q'uinal tic icha junoc an̈ xumac vanto spojeli, elan̈chamel stacjipaxi. Lajan pax icha tz'aj satxicanem junoc en̈ul.</t>
3: <t>Mamin, ¿tas yuj tzac' val och a sat d'ayin to anima inn̈ej? ¿Tas yuj tza nib'ej tza ch'olb'itej junoc tas malaj yelc'ochi?</t>
4: <t>¿Toc ay mach syal yic'anel tas vach' d'a scal tas man̈ vach'oc?</t>
5: <t>A ach tic tzala' jantac tiempo syil junjun anima. Chequel yaji jaye' sb'isul c'ual squila', max yal yec' jayeocxo c'ual uuj.</t>
6: <t>Iq'uel a sat d'ayin yic tzin can d'a junc'olal. Ac' tzalajb'oc in c'ol icha stzalajb'i sc'ol eb' munlajvum, ayic slajvi smunlaj eb'.</t>
7: <t>Ayic sch'acjiel junoc te te', scac'och yipoc co c'ool to ol ja svol te', axo te svol chi' sq'uib'xi.</t>
8: <t>Vach'chom te ichamxo te' sch'an̈al yib' chi', vach'chom vanxo sc'ab'at te' yib',</t>
9: <t>axo yic tz'emc'och sical a a' d'a te', syaxb'ixi te', svolanxi te' icha junoc te' yuneto tz'avchaji.</t>
10: <t>A on̈xo pax anima on̈ tic, ayic tzon̈ chami, man̈xa tas syal cuuj. Ayic tz'el co pixan, man̈xalaj mach tzon̈ ilani.</t>
11: <t>Icha tz'aj sq'ue vaan xob'al a' mar, ma icha tz'aj stup a a' sb'eyi,</t>
12: <t>icha chi' tz'aj co cham a on̈ anima on̈ tic. Yacb'an aytoec' satchaan̈ tic, malaj val junoc chamnac anima ol comon pitzvoc b'aj mucan, malaj junoc ol comon q'ue vaan d'a yed'tal chi'.</t>
13: <t>Comonoc tzin a c'ub'ejel d'a chamel chi', yacb'an tz'ec'b'at yoval a c'ool. Tza naanpaxi b'aq'uin̈ tzin a naxicoti.</t>
14: <t>A junoc anima schami, ¿tom ol pitzvocxi? Palta a inxo tic ol vac' techaj in yaelal tic, masanto ol c'och sc'ual vel d'a libre.</t>
15: <t>Ol ach avaj d'ayin, ol in tac'voc d'ayach. Ol am ach tzalaj in ilanochi, yujto a ach a b'onac in.</t>
16: <t>A ticnaic, q'uelan ach och d'a in b'eyb'al. Axo d'a jun c'ual chi', man̈xo ol ic' a cuenta d'a in mul.</t>
17: <t>Ol b'atcan in chucal chi' satc'olal uuj. Ol ac'an lajvoc in mul.</t>
18: <t>A lum nivac vitz ayic tz'elta lum c'acapil, satem luum, axo q'uen nivac q'ueen tz'el q'uen d'a yed'tal.</t>
19: <t>An̈ejtona' icha tz'aj yulaxb'at q'uen q'ueen d'a yol sb'e a a', ma icha tz'aj yic'chajb'at lum luum yuj a', icha chi' tz'aj ac'an lajvoc tas ayoch yipoc co c'ool a on̈ anima on̈ tic.</t>
20: <t>A ach te ec'b'al achn̈ej d'a quichan̈, tzon̈ ic'anxi meltzaj d'a juneln̈ej, tzac'an ixtax co sat yic tzon̈ chami.</t>
21: <t>Vach'chom a eb' calcuninal te b'inajnac ol aj eb', mato ay eb' man̈xalaj ol aj yelc'ochi, palta man̈xo cojtacoc, man̈xalaj mach ol yal yalan cab'i.</t>
22: <t>Q'uinaloc chamnac on̈xo, axon̈ej am cuuj scac' pensar, yujto scab'val syail, xchi vin̈aj Job chi'.</t>
